title: My Google Assistant isn't working
content: My Google Assistant stopped working. I have 1. rebooted my device several times 2. Made sure Google Assistant is turned on 3. Made sure the Language is correct 4. Made sure my home location is correct. 5. Made sure payment info is correct 6. Try to re train my voice, that didn't work. 7. Tried to uninstall and reinstall Google Assistant. Still isn't working
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4 XL
